meta.title: Bradford Schools Coronavirus Statement update 3/26/2020 - Bradford Exempted Village Schools

link.title: Bradford Elementary School - News

form.name: aspnetForm

div.p: Bradford EVSD will be closed to students beginning Monday 3/16/2020 through Friday 5/22/2020. All learning will occur online.

span.p: Bradford EVSD will be closed to students beginning Monday 3/16/2020 through Friday 5/22/2020. All learning will occur online.

a.title: Community Resources for Families in Need

li.a: Community Resources for Families in Need

a.title: John Doe vs. State of Ohio

li.a: John Doe vs. State of Ohio

p.b: In the ever changing situation, we want to continue to update the status of the Bradford EVSD. As I have said before, the safety of our students and staff is always our top concern. During the past few weeks, our educational process across the district, across the state and across the nation have changed dramatically. I am proud of our staff and students for the lessons being delivered and completed in a very non traditional manner. While nobody knows when these methods will return to “normal” we continue to try to make the best conditions possible for education.

At the time of this article, our kitchen staff and aides had distributed more than 1000 lunches to our students during our “shutdown”. We will continue to distribute lunches in a “five day bag” to those students that reserve lunches on Monday mornings before 10:00. Thanks to all that have made this possible!

Thank you to all students and staff for putting effort into this new way of education. A special note goes out to our seniors and upperclassmen for continuing to lead as an example! In a time when students should be making memories with athletics, dances and sharing time with friends, we have been thinking particularly about you! We will continue to update you whenever new information becomes available and do whatever we can to provide as much “normalcy” during this time.
Stay positive, stay safe and as always...Go Railroaders!
A printable version of this article can be found HERE.
